CustomField.description: If checked, the default action will be to send the UPS Email notification to you, the shipper. For return shipments, it will be sent to you, the "Return To" address.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, the default action will be to send the UPS Email notification to you, the shipper. For return shipments, it will be sent to you, the "Return To" address.
CustomField.label: Send Email Notification To Shipper
